1.Use a screwdriver to remove the screw from the cover.
4.Remove the screw that secures the lamp module.
5.Disconnect the lamp connector from the projector.Lift the handle so that it stands up. Pull out the lamp module by force.
1).To reduce the risk of personal injury, do not drop the lamp module or touch the lamp bulb.The bulb may shatter and cause injury if it is dropped.
2).To avoid burns,allow the projector to cool for at least 60 minutes before replacing the lamp.
3).We provide excellent refund service with no any contidition with 12 hours feedback.If you have any questions,please contact us.We will try our best to sole your problem as soon as possible.
